# `isAuthenticated()`

Use `nhost.auth.isAuthenticated` to check if the user is authenticated or not.

```ts
const isAuthenticated = nhost.auth.isAuthenticated()

if (isAuthenticated) {
  console.log('User is authenticated')
}
```
